TopicTitle: KS-121 Konstaar Basic Payload Delivery Vehicle (BPDV) | SSTO

Articles.Content:
Welcome Aboard the KS-121 Konstaar BPDV

The Konstaar is a basic payload SSTO constructed from mostly stock parts, except for the landing gear, which happen to be from Adjustable Landing Gear

I dont have much else to say, so Enjoy!

Craft file available at request.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Nicely done! I like the empennage area, especially. A very unique design.
Thank you very much! I aim to start a series a vehicles with a decently sized post, compared to this... Thanks for checking it out!
